body.name: Lerliuo Rattan Nightstand, Side End Table with Handmade Natural Rattan Door and Open Shelf, Wood Accent Night Stand with Storage, Mid Century Modern Bedside Table for Bedroom, Living Room (White)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 11 hrs 18 mins
features: 【White Rattan Nightstand】: The rattan door of our nightstand is made of natural rattan and hand-woven technique. The combination of bohemian and modern elements creates a unique look. The caned storage space is both beautiful and practical that provides perfect visual effect. Lerliuo's bedside tabled can blend perfectly with different home styles and decorations to create a comfortable space.

【Tool-Free Installation】: This nightstand with rattan door features an exclusive all-wood design. Its biggest highlight is that it can be installed tool-free. It is easy to complete the installation in 20 minutes only with your bare hands. You can choose to install the door on the left or right side. Metal corners are decorated on the four corners, which is both beautiful and protect the corners of the table, bringing a farmhouse atmosphere to your space.

【Ample Storage Space & Durable】: There is ample storage space inside the rattan door, which can meet your various storage needs with the spacious table top and open storage shelf. It can also creat a stylish display for your lamps, clocks or picture frames. This sturdy side table is made of high quality boards, which can provide great durability and stability.

【Rich Usage Scenarios】: Overall Size: 15.04 "W x 11.89" D x 23.39" H, its height matches most beds, sofas and chairs. It is a perfect addition to bedroom, living room, office and dorm room, which is ideal as a bedside table, sofa table, coffee table, and laptop table. Bring nature home and add a touch of uncommon elegance to your space！

【Installation and Service】:To make your installation easier, this rattan nightstand comes with step-by-step instructions and all marked tool parts. The package is packed with thicker foam and sturdy edges to protect the nightstands in good condition when it arrives. If you have any questions, please feel free to email us. We will reply within 24 hours and try our best to solve your problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice spare look and fit nicely into my angled wall
reviews.reviewText: Have a very tight space with room for only one nightstand next to the bed -- and it fits perfectly. Set the second one on an adjoining wall and the look is good. Reasonably sturdy and easy to assemble. Felt like it was going to be wobbly but when all assembled , it's fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10 minute Assembly and No tools required
reviews.reviewText: Cute, sturdy, and stylish. The color is popular and will prob match other products you already have. My kid assembled this while I provide direction. So easy! Great little side table for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very cute and easy to assemble. I needed small bedside tables that were not too expensive. A little smaller than I expected but I have a hard time visualizing 3D from pictures. Quality is what I expected for the price. Not a keep long term piece of furniture but it is cute and serves my current purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Want a huge fight with your spouse and a terrible day? Order these!
reviews.reviewText: So here’s the thing- I too read reviews of over tightening and cracking and thought “well, that won’t be me, I’ve built crappy furniture before, I know not to over tighten”. Well my friends, you haven’t built furniture this crappy.They really set you up for failure in step 1, which is the beauty of it, but you won’t find out until you flip the unit over in step 12. As you can see there are 2 styles of bolt included, Parts B and Parts H. You’ll notice in the directions and product list, Part H isn’t *actually* listed or used at all. In reality, Hs are slightly shorter than Bs- why does this matter? Well, if you use the Bs in step 1, AS INSTRUCTED TO DO, the tops of your nightstands will crack. Regardless of how hard you tighten, there will also be a gap between the leg and the table top because they’re TOO LONG. I’m assuming this is why they included the Hs, but made no mention of when or how to use them ever.So now I have a cracked and ruined product, because of the manufacturer’s own negligence. Don’t buy, but if you do, measure all part before beginning, formulate your own directions, and proceed with loads of caution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sturdy nightstand for guest room
reviews.reviewText: I built this for my guest room and it is the perfect small little nightstand for the room size. It's only about 2ish feet tall but it works for our space. Easy to put together and doesn't look or feel cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Practical, decorative, worth the price
reviews.reviewText: These are a practical pair for a small space. We ordered an initial set and the instructions need to be read clearly. We swapped out the longer screws for the shorter screws to assemble the tops. Otherwise you risk the screws pushing through the tops.Overall, we really loved the look, the gold accents and with careful review of the instructions these make a great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very beautiful nightstand
reviews.reviewText: Standing pretty by my bedside . Easy to assemble and very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the look but they just don’t make furniture like they used to. Splits if you tighten it too tight. Plastic like wood. But it looks ok and I’m overall happy with them
